alert.note: Alert for Eastern Walsh County; Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:25PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Marshall, southwestern Kittson, northwestern Grand Forks, Walsh and southeastern Pembina Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 624 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Joliette to Lankin. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grafton, Park River, Drayton, Minto, St. Thomas, Hoople and Fordville. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 170 and 204. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
